org.youscope.common.resource

Class ResourceAdapter<C extends ResourceConfiguration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.common.resource.ResourceAdapter<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, Component, Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardSaveSettings

    public abstract class ResourceAdapter<C extends ResourceConfiguration>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Resource
    Adapter to simplify resource creation.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: Component
        Sets the name of the component meant for human interpretation. Usually, the default name of a component contains already sufficient information. However, for some measurement types it can be of advantage to rename certain components which have a specific meaning for the respective measurement.
        Specified by:
        setName in interface Component
        Parameters:
        name - Name/short description of the component.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getUUID

        public java.util.UUID getUUID()
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: Component
        Returns a unique ID of the component. No two components have the same unique ID, even if they are created using the same configuration. See UUID.equals(Object) and UUID.randomUUID().
        Specified by:
        getUUID in interface Component
        Returns:
        Unique ID of the component.
